member.summary: Instantiates and returns the configured concrete default instance of a .

member.summary: Instantiates and returns the specified by the instance.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.ImportProvider.Initialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Initializes the specified provider.

summary.p: This method is called by the import engine in order to ask the provider what pieces of information it needs from the user in order to proceed with the import.
This method returns a used to gather the required installation information. This control will be returned back to the provider after the user provides the information.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.ImportProvider.Import(System.Web.UI.Control)
member.summary: Provides the import information as provided by the user back into the import provider and begins the import. The control passed in should be the same as that provided in , but with user values supplied within it.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.ImportProvider.ValidateImportInformation(System.Web.UI.Control)
member.summary: Validates the installation information provided by the user. Returns a string with an explanation of why it is incorrect.

member.name: P:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.ImportProvider.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name.

member.name: P:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.ImportProvider.Providers
member.summary: Returns a containing instances for each . Note that these are not the actual providers, simply information about the installed providers.

member.name: T:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.ImportProviderConfiguration
member.summary: Provider configuration instance for the .

member.summary: Configuration section handler for the . Most of the implementation is in the base class. This merely follows the factory pattern in providing a method to create a proper instance.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.ImportProviderSectionHandler.CreateProviderConfigurationInstance
member.summary: Creates an instance which is populated by this section handler.

member.name: T:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.InstallationProvider
member.summary: Provider for classes that implement installation procedures. This allows new data providers to implement their own installation code.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.InstallationProvider.Instance
member.summary: Returns the configured concrete instance of a .

summary.p: This method is called by the installation engine in order to ask the provider what pieces of information it needs from the user in order to proceed with the installation.
This method returns a used to gather the required installation information. This will be returned back to the provider after the user provides the information.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.InstallationProvider.ProvideInstallationInformation(System.Web.UI.Control)
member.summary: Provides the installation information as provided by the user back into the provider. The control passed in should be the same as that provided in , but with user values supplied within it.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.InstallationProvider.ValidateInstallationInformation(System.Web.UI.Control)
member.summary: Validates the installation information provided by the user. Returns a string with an explanation of why it is incorrect.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.InstallationProvider.GetInstallationStatus(System.Version)
member.summary: Gets the installation status.
member.param: The version of the assembly that represents this installation.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.InstallationProvider.Upgrade(System.Version)
member.summary: Upgrades this instance. Returns true if it was successful.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.InstallationProvider.Install(System.Version)
member.summary: Installs this instance.
member.param: The current assembly version being installed.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.InstallationProvider.Repair
member.summary: Attempts to repair this instance. Returns true if it was successful.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.InstallationProvider.IsInstallationException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified exception is due to a problem with the installation.
member.returns: true if this is an installation exception; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.InstallationProvider.GetCurrentInstalledVersion
member.summary: Gets the of the current Subtext installation.

member.name: M:Subtext.Extensibility.Providers.InstallationProvider.UpdateCurrentInstalledVersion(System.Version,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction)
member.summary: Updates the current installed version.
member.param: The new version that is now current.
